readable.title: 3283913180_7d4e43602d
readable.content: A man rides a skateboard off of a picnic table over the steps . a man skateboard down a railing . A skateboarder is jumping off a wooden table down some steps . Onlookers watch as a man on a skateboard attempts a trick off a table sitting on stairs . People watch as a man does skateboard tricks down a table on the steps .
